N = int(raw_input())

for i in xrange(N):
    length = int(raw_input())
    array = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
    count = 0
    
    a = [0 for j in xrange(max(array))]
    
    for j in array:
        a[j - 1] += 1
        
    key = max(a)
    
    for j in xrange(len(a)):
        if key == a[j]:
            print str(j + 1) + " " + str(key)
            break
